text: Achttienhoven is a hamlet in the Dutch province of South Holland. It is a part of the municipality of Nieuwkoop, and lies about 7 km north of Woerden. The statistical area "Achttienhoven", which also includes the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 130. Between 1817 and 1855, Achttienhoven was a separate municipality, sometimes called "Achttienhoven en de Bosch". The nature reserve De Haeck lies northwest of the hamlet. ==References== Category:Populated places in South Holland Category:Former municipalities of South Holland Category:Geography of Nieuwkoop
title: Achttienhoven, South Holland
